mapper.select: SELECT viewtime, point, adno,num FROM (SELECT viewtime, point, adno,rownum as num FROM (SELECT no,subject,name,regdate,hit FROM adviewlist ORDER BY viewtime DESC)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} AND id=#{id}
SELECT adsubject FROM ad WHERE adno=#{adno}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM adviewlist WHERE id=#{id}
